Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20005448 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Normandy Two, LLC, d/b/a Bardolino, to establish and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 1496 Second Avenue, Borough of the Manhattan, Council District no. 5.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Application no. 20015113 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Deluxe on Broadway, Inc, d/b/a Deluxe, to continue to maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 2896 Broadway, Borough of the Manhattan, Council District no. 9.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 000675 GFM, pursuant to §197-c, §197-d and §364-d of the New York City Charter, for a revocable consent to construct and maintain two information kiosks, in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 4.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)2 of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.

Application no. 20015008 TCX, pursuant to §20-225 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Clirkat Donuts, Inc., d/b/a Angelo's Donuts, to establish and operate an enclosed sidewalk café located at 2942-44 Westchester Avenue, Borough of the Bronx, Council District no. 13.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-225(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Application no. 20005409 GFM, pursuant to §363 of the Charter of the City of New York, concerning a proposed Authorizing Resolution authorizing the Department Of Transportation to grant a franchise for the provision of aerial tramway service over the East River between Manhattan and Roosevelt Island to the Roosevelt Island Operating Corporation.
Items.MatterName: UDAAP, Aerial Tramway Service, Manhattan and Roosevelt Island, (20005409GFM)

Items.Title: Proposed authorizing resolution permitting the Department of Transportation to grant non-exclusive franchises for the provision of subsidized bus service in the City of New York. 20015160 GFY
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Franchises subsidized bus service, Citywide (20015160GFY)
